name: Chipotle Chili Butter
description: Herbed butter provides a delicious burst of flavour to all kinds of foods. Ideal for corn on the cob or grilled fish.

ingredients.name: Chipotle Aioli Mix or Ancho Lime Rub

preparation: Stir Chipotle Mix and Chili Lime Topper into butter.

products.name: Chipotle Aioli Mix
summary: Medium-spicy Southwestern flavor with noteworthy chipotle chili and smoked paprika. A crowd-pleasing condiment for your burgers, fries, fish tacos, burritos and anything else that needs a little extra kick.

products.name: Ancho Lime Rub
summary: Tangy citrus meets medium heat to create a unique and complementary flavour, inspired by traditional Mexican cuisine.
